body_content.explanation: stone used as a building material that is blue or similar to blue in colour:
examples: The new pathways will be lined with bluestone.
The Inn has been created out of a former fire station, a bluestone Victorian building.

body_content.explanation: one of the slightly smaller stones that form the inner, oldest part of the ancient monument of Stonehenge in southern England:
examples: Scientists believe the bluestones were first put in place about 2600 B. C.
